name: Phyllotaxis
description:
Welcome to Phyllotaxis!  a game by me, Tyler Rhodes for Team Dogpit's Cultivation ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Create NEW plants with Phyllotaxis! By watching balls roll around on an unknown terrain in an unknown space, the spiral degree of phyllotaxis will grow! Can you reach the Golden Ratio?? ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ How to Play Use your Mouse to move around and press Space to spawn SeedBalls. The number is the spiral degree for the impending plant.

Change the Slider on the right hand side to multiply the degree by that number for your next SeedBall! Get bigger degree numbers! Hold Right Click to Zoom In.

Press R to reload the scene if you spawn too many plants, and ESC to Exit. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Special Thanks to:

Peter Olthof John Leonard French
